metadata.name: Faith & Hope: The Merging #1/1
metadata.description:
The distance between your dreams and reality is you. 

Before you achieve any dream, which by definition is not yet “real”, you must first envision it. Then strive for it. 
That gap is slowly closed, bridged, by faith and hope. Over time, faith and hope, mixed with action, turn your dreams into reality. 

So go on and merge the two. Let life imitate art and art imitate life. For they coexist in a beautiful dance. Go dance. And allow your dreams to become reality.
